DOC.brief_title: The Effect Snack Consumption Energy Intake Preschoolers
DOC.detailed_description: Providing snack child widely recommend appetite regulation assist meet nutritional guidelines.1 Currently , snack contribute large portion dietary intake child previous years.2,3 Additionally , observational research find self-reported , low-nutrient-dense snack consumption , increase among preschooler ( age 2-to-6 year ) past 20 year , lead increase total daily energy intake.3 However , experimental study examine influence snack intake energy consumption child conducted.2 Therefore , time clear snack impact appetite regulation energy intake , especially young child . Thus , purpose pilot study examine influence provide snack consumption overall energy intake child age 2-5 year Early Learning Center ( ELC ) University Tennessee . Children provide 3-to-5 ad libitum eat occasion course day three session . To test effect provide snack preschooler consumption food throughout day , food provide three way three different session : 1 ) child provide three meal ( TM ) ; 2 ) child provide three meal two snack , total amount food provide day TM ( M+S ) ; 3 ) child provide three meal two snack total amount provide meal equal TM total amount provide snack equal M+S ( TM+S ) . Primary Hypothesis : 1 ) Energy consume food beverage greatest TM+S session , follow M+S , TM .
